name: Beach Cleaner 2000
description:
This prototype was made over the weekend for the Isolation Game Jam.

You are a small beach-cleaning robot. Pick up litter from the beach and deposit it in the rubbish bin to increase your score - see how high you can reach within the time.

Cans are worth 15, bottles are worth 10, paper is worth 7 points.

The crabs will hassle you and push you around!

Objects can be buried by the sea - if they are, pick up the spade and stand near them to dig them out. This includes the bin, should you push it out to sea!

Controls:
  • WASD to move
  •  Space to pickup/put down objects
  • Dig things out by picking up the spade and standing near them.

Full source code is available at: https://github.com/ElliotB256/beach/blob/master/readme.md

Us:
  • ElliotB256 and Pobiega for programming.
  • ElliotB256 and Sarfus for sprites.
Attribution for sounds:
  • Pickup and drop: JDWasabi
  • Rubbish deposit: Neezen
